directions: Combine chicken, sweet potatoes, applesauce, onion, curry powder, garlic, apple cider vinegar, ginger, salt, and pepper in a resealable freezer bag; place in the freezer until ready to cook.
Place chicken mixture into a slow cooker on Low heat; cover. Cook until chicken is tender, about 8 hours.
ingredients: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Paleo Chicken with Apple and  Sweet Potato
